__e: It's never as true as it is about food in this region.
I've got business in the area so I figured I'd swing by, take a few days off check out the old digs.
And whatever decision you make, as a citizen of this great nation, I vow to be the best man I can possibly be. King or not.
I want the names, ranks and service records of anyone who left the Tarcento Brigade of the Alpine Army Corps in the last 12 months. On my desk in an hour. Yes, boss.
Because I do believe that locale holds the strongest possibility for survival, and I wanted to survive.
A region I'm most fond of.
